name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及X光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。食品材料簡介。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction(1)
Week 2: Atomic Structure & Physical Properties(2)
Week 3: Structure of Real Materials(3)
Week 4: Temperature Effects(4)
Week 5: Phase Transformations(5)
Week 6: Mechanical Properties(6)
Week 7: Making Strong Materials(7)
Week 8: Engineering Materials(8)
Week 9:　　Midterm Exam 
Week 10: Time/Temperature & Mechanical Properties(9)
Week 11: Oxidation & Corrosion(10)
Week 12: Fracture & Fatigue(11)
Week 13: Composite Materials(12)
Week 14: Materials Processing(13)
Week 15: Materials Selection(14)
Week 16: Experimental Methods(15)
Week 17: Introduction to food components
Week 18: Final Exam
